00071 /* GREASE PENCIL DRAWING */
00072 
00073 /* ----- General Defines ------ */
00074 
00075 /* flags for sflag */
00076 typedef enum eDrawStrokeFlags {
00077     GP_DRAWDATA_NOSTATUS    = (1<<0),   /* don't draw status info */
00078     GP_DRAWDATA_ONLY3D      = (1<<1),   /* only draw 3d-strokes */
00079     GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYV2D     = (1<<2),   /* only draw 'canvas' strokes */
00080     GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYI2D     = (1<<3),   /* only draw 'image' strokes */
00081     GP_DRAWDATA_IEDITHACK   = (1<<4),   /* special hack for drawing strokes in Image Editor (weird coordinates) */
00082     GP_DRAWDATA_NO_XRAY     = (1<<5),   /* don't draw xray in 3D view (which is default) */
00083 } eDrawStrokeFlags;
00084 
00085 
00086 
00087 /* thickness above which we should use special drawing */
00088 #define GP_DRAWTHICKNESS_SPECIAL    3
00089 
00090 /* ----- Tool Buffer Drawing ------ */
00091 
00092 /* draw stroke defined in buffer (simple ogl lines/points for now, as dotted lines) */
00093 static void gp_draw_stroke_buffer (tGPspoint *points, int totpoints, short thickness, short dflag, short sflag)
00094 {
00095     tGPspoint *pt;
00096     int i;
00097     
00098     /* error checking */
00099     if ((points == NULL) || (totpoints <= 0))
00100         return;
00101     
00102     /* check if buffer can be drawn */
00103     if (dflag & (GP_DRAWDATA_ONLY3D|GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYV2D))
00104         return;
00105     
00106     /* if drawing a single point, draw it larger */ 
00107     if (totpoints == 1) {       
00108         /* draw point */
00109         glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00110             glVertex2iv(&points->x);
00111         glEnd();
00112     }
00113     else if (sflag & GP_STROKE_ERASER) {
00114         /* don't draw stroke at all! */
00115     }
00116     else {
00117         float oldpressure = points[0].pressure;
00118         
00119         /* draw stroke curve */
00120         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) setlinestyle(2);
00121 
00122         glLineWidth(oldpressure * thickness);
00123         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00124 
00125         for (i=0, pt=points; i < totpoints && pt; i++, pt++) {
00126             /* if there was a significant pressure change, stop the curve, change the thickness of the stroke,
00127              * and continue drawing again (since line-width cannot change in middle of GL_LINE_STRIP)
00128              */
00129             if (fabsf(pt->pressure - oldpressure) > 0.2f) {
00130                 glEnd();
00131                 glLineWidth(pt->pressure * thickness);
00132                 glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00133                 
00134                 /* need to roll-back one point to ensure that there are no gaps in the stroke */
00135                 if (i != 0) glVertex2iv(&(pt - 1)->x);
00136 
00137                 /* now the point we want... */
00138                 glVertex2iv(&pt->x);
00139                 
00140                 oldpressure = pt->pressure;
00141             }
00142             else
00143                 glVertex2iv(&pt->x);
00144         }
00145         glEnd();
00146 
00147         /* reset for predictable OpenGL context */
00148         glLineWidth(1.0f);
00149         
00150         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) setlinestyle(0);
00151     }
00152 }
00153 
00154 /* ----- Existing Strokes Drawing (3D and Point) ------ */
00155 
00156 /* draw a given stroke - just a single dot (only one point) */
00157 static void gp_draw_stroke_point (bGPDspoint *points, short thickness, short dflag, short sflag, int offsx, int offsy, int winx, int winy)
00158 {
00159     /* draw point */
00160     if (sflag & GP_STROKE_3DSPACE) {
00161         glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00162             glVertex3fv(&points->x);
00163         glEnd();
00164     }
00165     else {
00166         float co[2];
00167         
00168         /* get coordinates of point */
00169         if (sflag & GP_STROKE_2DSPACE) {
00170             co[0]= points->x;
00171             co[1]= points->y;
00172         }
00173         else if (sflag & GP_STROKE_2DIMAGE) {
00174             co[0]= (points->x * winx) + offsx;
00175             co[1]= (points->y * winy) + offsy;
00176         }
00177         else {
00178             co[0]= (points->x / 100 * winx) + offsx;
00179             co[1]= (points->y / 100 * winy) + offsy;
00180         }
00181         
00182         /* if thickness is less than GP_DRAWTHICKNESS_SPECIAL, simple dot looks ok
00183          *  - also mandatory in if Image Editor 'image-based' dot
00184          */
00185         if ( (thickness < GP_DRAWTHICKNESS_SPECIAL) ||
00186              ((dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_IEDITHACK) && (sflag & GP_STROKE_2DSPACE)) )
00187         {
00188             glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00189                 glVertex2fv(co);
00190             glEnd();
00191         }
00192         else {
00193             /* draw filled circle as is done in circf (but without the matrix push/pops which screwed things up) */
00194             GLUquadricObj *qobj = gluNewQuadric(); 
00195             
00196             gluQuadricDrawStyle(qobj, GLU_FILL); 
00197             
00198             /* need to translate drawing position, but must reset after too! */
00199             glTranslatef(co[0], co[1], 0.0);
00200             gluDisk(qobj, 0.0,  thickness, 32, 1); 
00201             glTranslatef(-co[0], -co[1], 0.0);
00202             
00203             gluDeleteQuadric(qobj);
00204         }
00205     }
00206 }
00207 
00208 /* draw a given stroke in 3d (i.e. in 3d-space), using simple ogl lines */
00209 static void gp_draw_stroke_3d (bGPDspoint *points, int totpoints, short thickness, short debug)
00210 {
00211     bGPDspoint *pt;
00212     float oldpressure = 0.0f;
00213     int i;
00214     
00215     /* draw stroke curve */
00216     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00217     for (i=0, pt=points; i < totpoints && pt; i++, pt++) {
00218         /* if there was a significant pressure change, stop the curve, change the thickness of the stroke,
00219          * and continue drawing again (since line-width cannot change in middle of GL_LINE_STRIP)
00220          */
00221         if (fabsf(pt->pressure - oldpressure) > 0.2f) {
00222             glEnd();
00223             glLineWidth(pt->pressure * thickness);
00224             glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00225             
00226             /* need to roll-back one point to ensure that there are no gaps in the stroke */
00227             if (i != 0) glVertex3fv(&(pt - 1)->x);
00228 
00229             /* now the point we want... */
00230             glVertex3fv(&pt->x);
00231             
00232             oldpressure = pt->pressure;
00233         }
00234         else {
00235             glVertex3fv(&pt->x);
00236         }
00237     }
00238     glEnd();
00239     
00240     /* draw debug points of curve on top? */
00241     if (debug) {
00242         glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00243         for (i=0, pt=points; i < totpoints && pt; i++, pt++)
00244             glVertex3fv(&pt->x);
00245         glEnd();
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 /* ----- Fancy 2D-Stroke Drawing ------ */
00250 
00251 /* draw a given stroke in 2d */
00252 static void gp_draw_stroke (bGPDspoint *points, int totpoints, short thickness_s, short dflag, short sflag, 
00253                             short debug, int offsx, int offsy, int winx, int winy)
00254 {
00255     /* otherwise thickness is twice that of the 3D view */
00256     float thickness= (float)thickness_s * 0.5f;
00257 
00258     /* if thickness is less than GP_DRAWTHICKNESS_SPECIAL, 'smooth' opengl lines look better
00259      *  - 'smooth' opengl lines are also required if Image Editor 'image-based' stroke
00260      */
00261     if ( (thickness < GP_DRAWTHICKNESS_SPECIAL) || 
00262          ((dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_IEDITHACK) && (dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYV2D)) ) 
00263     {
00264         bGPDspoint *pt;
00265         int i;
00266         
00267         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00268         for (i=0, pt=points; i < totpoints && pt; i++, pt++) {
00269             if (sflag & GP_STROKE_2DSPACE) {
00270                 glVertex2f(pt->x, pt->y);
00271             }
00272             else if (sflag & GP_STROKE_2DIMAGE) {
00273                 const float x= (pt->x * winx) + offsx;
00274                 const float y= (pt->y * winy) + offsy;
00275                 
00276                 glVertex2f(x, y);
00277             }
00278             else {
00279                 const float x= (pt->x / 100 * winx) + offsx;
00280                 const float y= (pt->y / 100 * winy) + offsy;
00281                 
00282                 glVertex2f(x, y);
00283             }
00284         }
00285         glEnd();
00286     }
00287     
00288     /* tessellation code - draw stroke as series of connected quads with connection
00289      * edges rotated to minimise shrinking artifacts, and rounded endcaps
00290      */
00291     else {
00292         bGPDspoint *pt1, *pt2;
00293         float pm[2];
00294         int i;
00295         
00296         glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00297         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00298         
00299         for (i=0, pt1=points, pt2=points+1; i < (totpoints-1); i++, pt1++, pt2++) {
00300             float s0[2], s1[2];     /* segment 'center' points */
00301             float t0[2], t1[2];     /* tessellated coordinates */
00302             float m1[2], m2[2];     /* gradient and normal */
00303             float mt[2], sc[2];     /* gradient for thickness, point for end-cap */
00304             float pthick;           /* thickness at segment point */
00305             
00306             /* get x and y coordinates from points */
00307             if (sflag & GP_STROKE_2DSPACE) {
00308                 s0[0]= pt1->x;      s0[1]= pt1->y;
00309                 s1[0]= pt2->x;      s1[1]= pt2->y;
00310             }
00311             else if (sflag & GP_STROKE_2DIMAGE) {
00312                 s0[0]= (pt1->x * winx) + offsx;         
00313                 s0[1]= (pt1->y * winy) + offsy;
00314                 s1[0]= (pt2->x * winx) + offsx;     
00315                 s1[1]= (pt2->y * winy) + offsy;
00316             }
00317             else {
00318                 s0[0]= (pt1->x / 100 * winx) + offsx;
00319                 s0[1]= (pt1->y / 100 * winy) + offsy;
00320                 s1[0]= (pt2->x / 100 * winx) + offsx;
00321                 s1[1]= (pt2->y / 100 * winy) + offsy;
00322             }       
00323             
00324             /* calculate gradient and normal - 'angle'=(ny/nx) */
00325             m1[1]= s1[1] - s0[1];       
00326             m1[0]= s1[0] - s0[0];
00327             normalize_v2(m1);
00328             m2[1]= -m1[0];
00329             m2[0]= m1[1];
00330             
00331             /* always use pressure from first point here */
00332             pthick= (pt1->pressure * thickness);
00333             
00334             /* if the first segment, start of segment is segment's normal */
00335             if (i == 0) {
00336                 /* draw start cap first 
00337                  *  - make points slightly closer to center (about halfway across) 
00338                  */             
00339                 mt[0]= m2[0] * pthick * 0.5f;
00340                 mt[1]= m2[1] * pthick * 0.5f;
00341                 sc[0]= s0[0] - (m1[0] * pthick * 0.75f);
00342                 sc[1]= s0[1] - (m1[1] * pthick * 0.75f);
00343                 
00344                 t0[0]= sc[0] - mt[0];
00345                 t0[1]= sc[1] - mt[1];
00346                 t1[0]= sc[0] + mt[0];
00347                 t1[1]= sc[1] + mt[1];
00348                 
00349                 glVertex2fv(t0);
00350                 glVertex2fv(t1);
00351                 
00352                 /* calculate points for start of segment */
00353                 mt[0]= m2[0] * pthick;
00354                 mt[1]= m2[1] * pthick;
00355                 
00356                 t0[0]= s0[0] - mt[0];
00357                 t0[1]= s0[1] - mt[1];
00358                 t1[0]= s0[0] + mt[0];
00359                 t1[1]= s0[1] + mt[1];
00360                 
00361                 /* draw this line twice (first to finish off start cap, then for stroke) */
00362                 glVertex2fv(t1);
00363                 glVertex2fv(t0);
00364                 glVertex2fv(t0);
00365                 glVertex2fv(t1);
00366             }
00367             /* if not the first segment, use bisector of angle between segments */
00368             else {
00369                 float mb[2];        /* bisector normal */
00370                 float athick, dfac;     /* actual thickness, difference between thicknesses */
00371                 
00372                 /* calculate gradient of bisector (as average of normals) */
00373                 mb[0]= (pm[0] + m2[0]) / 2;
00374                 mb[1]= (pm[1] + m2[1]) / 2;
00375                 normalize_v2(mb);
00376                 
00377                 /* calculate gradient to apply 
00378                  *  - as basis, use just pthick * bisector gradient
00379                  *  - if cross-section not as thick as it should be, add extra padding to fix it
00380                  */
00381                 mt[0]= mb[0] * pthick;
00382                 mt[1]= mb[1] * pthick;
00383                 athick= len_v2(mt);
00384                 dfac= pthick - (athick * 2);
00385 
00386                 if (((athick * 2.0f) < pthick) && (IS_EQF(athick, pthick)==0)) {
00387                     mt[0] += (mb[0] * dfac);
00388                     mt[1] += (mb[1] * dfac);
00389                 }   
00390                 
00391                 /* calculate points for start of segment */
00392                 t0[0]= s0[0] - mt[0];
00393                 t0[1]= s0[1] - mt[1];
00394                 t1[0]= s0[0] + mt[0];
00395                 t1[1]= s0[1] + mt[1];
00396                 
00397                 /* draw this line twice (once for end of current segment, and once for start of next) */
00398                 glVertex2fv(t1);
00399                 glVertex2fv(t0);
00400                 glVertex2fv(t0);
00401                 glVertex2fv(t1);
00402             }
00403             
00404             /* if last segment, also draw end of segment (defined as segment's normal) */
00405             if (i == totpoints-2) {
00406                 /* for once, we use second point's pressure (otherwise it won't be drawn) */
00407                 pthick= (pt2->pressure * thickness);
00408                 
00409                 /* calculate points for end of segment */
00410                 mt[0]= m2[0] * pthick;
00411                 mt[1]= m2[1] * pthick;
00412                 
00413                 t0[0]= s1[0] - mt[0];
00414                 t0[1]= s1[1] - mt[1];
00415                 t1[0]= s1[0] + mt[0];
00416                 t1[1]= s1[1] + mt[1];
00417                 
00418                 /* draw this line twice (once for end of stroke, and once for endcap)*/
00419                 glVertex2fv(t1);
00420                 glVertex2fv(t0);
00421                 glVertex2fv(t0);
00422                 glVertex2fv(t1);
00423                 
00424                 
00425                 /* draw end cap as last step 
00426                  *  - make points slightly closer to center (about halfway across) 
00427                  */             
00428                 mt[0]= m2[0] * pthick * 0.5f;
00429                 mt[1]= m2[1] * pthick * 0.5f;
00430                 sc[0]= s1[0] + (m1[0] * pthick * 0.75f);
00431                 sc[1]= s1[1] + (m1[1] * pthick * 0.75f);
00432                 
00433                 t0[0]= sc[0] - mt[0];
00434                 t0[1]= sc[1] - mt[1];
00435                 t1[0]= sc[0] + mt[0];
00436                 t1[1]= sc[1] + mt[1];
00437                 
00438                 glVertex2fv(t1);
00439                 glVertex2fv(t0);
00440             }
00441             
00442             /* store stroke's 'natural' normal for next stroke to use */
00443             copy_v2_v2(pm, m2);
00444         }
00445         
00446         glEnd();
00447     }
00448     
00449     /* draw debug points of curve on top? (original stroke points) */
00450     if (debug) {
00451         bGPDspoint *pt;
00452         int i;
00453         
00454         glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00455         for (i=0, pt=points; i < totpoints && pt; i++, pt++) {
00456             if (sflag & GP_STROKE_2DSPACE) {
00457                 glVertex2fv(&pt->x);
00458             }
00459             else if (sflag & GP_STROKE_2DIMAGE) {
00460                 const float x= (float)((pt->x * winx) + offsx);
00461                 const float y= (float)((pt->y * winy) + offsy);
00462                 
00463                 glVertex2f(x, y);
00464             }
00465             else {
00466                 const float x= (float)(pt->x / 100 * winx) + offsx;
00467                 const float y= (float)(pt->y / 100 * winy) + offsy;
00468                 
00469                 glVertex2f(x, y);
00470             }
00471         }
00472         glEnd();
00473     }
00474 }
00475 
00476 /* ----- General Drawing ------ */
00477 
00478 /* draw a set of strokes */
00479 static void gp_draw_strokes (bGPDframe *gpf, int offsx, int offsy, int winx, int winy, int dflag,  
00480                              short debug, short lthick, float color[4])
00481 {
00482     bGPDstroke *gps;
00483     
00484     /* set color first (may need to reset it again later too) */
00485     glColor4fv(color);
00486     
00487     for (gps= gpf->strokes.first; gps; gps= gps->next) {
00488         /* check if stroke can be drawn - checks here generally fall into pairs */
00489         if ((dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_ONLY3D) && !(gps->flag & GP_STROKE_3DSPACE))
00490             continue;
00491         if (!(dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_ONLY3D) && (gps->flag & GP_STROKE_3DSPACE))
00492             continue;
00493         if ((dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYV2D) && !(gps->flag & GP_STROKE_2DSPACE))
00494             continue;
00495         if (!(dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYV2D) && (gps->flag & GP_STROKE_2DSPACE))
00496             continue;
00497         if ((dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYI2D) && !(gps->flag & GP_STROKE_2DIMAGE))
00498             continue;
00499         if (!(dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYI2D) && (gps->flag & GP_STROKE_2DIMAGE))
00500             continue;
00501         if ((gps->points == NULL) || (gps->totpoints < 1))
00502             continue;
00503         
00504         /* check which stroke-drawer to use */
00505         if (gps->totpoints == 1)
00506             gp_draw_stroke_point(gps->points, lthick, dflag, gps->flag, offsx, offsy, winx, winy);
00507         else if (dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_ONLY3D) {
00508             const int no_xray= (dflag & GP_DRAWDATA_NO_XRAY);
00509             int mask_orig = 0;
00510             
00511             if (no_xray) {
00512                 glGetIntegerv(GL_DEPTH_WRITEMASK, &mask_orig);
00513                 glDepthMask(0);
00514                 glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00515                 
00516                 /* first arg is normally rv3d->dist, but this isn't available here and seems to work quite well without */
00517                 bglPolygonOffset(1.0f, 1.0f);
00518 #if 0
00519                 glEnable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_LINE);
00520                 glPolygonOffset(-1.0f, -1.0f);
00521 #endif
00522             }
00523             
00524             gp_draw_stroke_3d(gps->points, gps->totpoints, lthick, debug);
00525             
00526             if (no_xray) {
00527                 glDepthMask(mask_orig);
00528                 glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00529                 
00530                 bglPolygonOffset(0.0, 0.0);
00531 #if 0
00532                 glDisable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_LINE);
00533                 glPolygonOffset(0, 0);
00534 #endif
00535             }
00536         }
00537         else if (gps->totpoints > 1)    
00538             gp_draw_stroke(gps->points, gps->totpoints, lthick, dflag, gps->flag, debug, offsx, offsy, winx, winy);
00539     }
00540 }
00541 
00542 /* draw grease-pencil datablock */
00543 static void gp_draw_data (bGPdata *gpd, int offsx, int offsy, int winx, int winy, int cfra, int dflag)
00544 {
00545     bGPDlayer *gpl;
00546     
00547     /* reset line drawing style (in case previous user didn't reset) */
00548     setlinestyle(0);
00549     
00550     /* turn on smooth lines (i.e. anti-aliasing) */
00551     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00552     
00553     /* turn on alpha-blending */
00554     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00555     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00556         
00557     /* loop over layers, drawing them */
00558     for (gpl= gpd->layers.first; gpl; gpl= gpl->next) {
00559         bGPDframe *gpf;
00560         
00561         short debug = (gpl->flag & GP_LAYER_DRAWDEBUG) ? 1 : 0;
00562         short lthick= gpl->thickness;
00563         float color[4], tcolor[4];
00564         
00565         /* don't draw layer if hidden */
00566         if (gpl->flag & GP_LAYER_HIDE) 
00567             continue;
00568         
00569         /* get frame to draw */
00570         gpf= gpencil_layer_getframe(gpl, cfra, 0);
00571         if (gpf == NULL) 
00572             continue;
00573         
00574         /* set color, stroke thickness, and point size */
00575         glLineWidth(lthick);
00576         copy_v4_v4(color, gpl->color); // just for copying 4 array elements
00577         copy_v4_v4(tcolor, gpl->color); // additional copy of color (for ghosting)
00578         glColor4fv(color);
00579         glPointSize((float)(gpl->thickness + 2));
00580         
00581         /* apply xray layer setting */
00582         if (gpl->flag & GP_LAYER_NO_XRAY)   dflag |=  GP_DRAWDATA_NO_XRAY;
00583         else                                dflag &= ~GP_DRAWDATA_NO_XRAY;
00584         
00585         /* draw 'onionskins' (frame left + right) */
00586         if (gpl->flag & GP_LAYER_ONIONSKIN) {
00587             /* drawing method - only immediately surrounding (gstep = 0), or within a frame range on either side (gstep > 0)*/          
00588             if (gpl->gstep) {
00589                 bGPDframe *gf;
00590                 float fac;
00591                 
00592                 /* draw previous frames first */
00593                 for (gf=gpf->prev; gf; gf=gf->prev) {
00594                     /* check if frame is drawable */
00595                     if ((gpf->framenum - gf->framenum) <= gpl->gstep) {
00596                         /* alpha decreases with distance from curframe index */
00597                         fac= 1.0f - ((float)(gpf->framenum - gf->framenum) / (float)(gpl->gstep + 1));
00598                         tcolor[3] = color[3] * fac * 0.66f;
00599                         gp_draw_strokes(gf, offsx, offsy, winx, winy, dflag, debug, lthick, tcolor);
00600                     }
00601                     else 
00602                         break;
00603                 }
00604                 
00605                 /* now draw next frames */
00606                 for (gf= gpf->next; gf; gf=gf->next) {
00607                     /* check if frame is drawable */
00608                     if ((gf->framenum - gpf->framenum) <= gpl->gstep) {
00609                         /* alpha decreases with distance from curframe index */
00610                         fac= 1.0f - ((float)(gf->framenum - gpf->framenum) / (float)(gpl->gstep + 1));
00611                         tcolor[3] = color[3] * fac * 0.66f;
00612                         gp_draw_strokes(gf, offsx, offsy, winx, winy, dflag, debug, lthick, tcolor);
00613                     }
00614                     else 
00615                         break;
00616                 }   
00617                 
00618                 /* restore alpha */
00619                 glColor4fv(color);
00620             }
00621             else {
00622                 /* draw the strokes for the ghost frames (at half of the alpha set by user) */
00623                 if (gpf->prev) {
00624                     tcolor[3] = (color[3] / 7);
00625                     gp_draw_strokes(gpf->prev, offsx, offsy, winx, winy, dflag, debug, lthick, tcolor);
00626                 }
00627                 
00628                 if (gpf->next) {
00629                     tcolor[3] = (color[3] / 4);
00630                     gp_draw_strokes(gpf->next, offsx, offsy, winx, winy, dflag, debug, lthick, tcolor);
00631                 }
00632                 
00633                 /* restore alpha */
00634                 glColor4fv(color);
00635             }
00636         }
00637         
00638         /* draw the strokes already in active frame */
00639         tcolor[3]= color[3];
00640         gp_draw_strokes(gpf, offsx, offsy, winx, winy, dflag, debug, lthick, tcolor);
00641         
00642         /* Check if may need to draw the active stroke cache, only if this layer is the active layer
00643          * that is being edited. (Stroke buffer is currently stored in gp-data)
00644          */
00645         if (ED_gpencil_session_active() && (gpl->flag & GP_LAYER_ACTIVE) &&
00646             (gpf->flag & GP_FRAME_PAINT)) 
00647         {
00648             /* Buffer stroke needs to be drawn with a different linestyle to help differentiate them from normal strokes. */
00649             gp_draw_stroke_buffer(gpd->sbuffer, gpd->sbuffer_size, lthick, dflag, gpd->sbuffer_sflag);
00650         }
00651     }
00652     
00653     /* turn off alpha blending, then smooth lines */
00654     glDisable(GL_BLEND); // alpha blending
00655     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH); // smooth lines
00656         
00657     /* restore initial gl conditions */
00658     glLineWidth(1.0);
00659     glPointSize(1.0);
00660     glColor4f(0, 0, 0, 1);
00661 }
00662 
00663 /* ----- Grease Pencil Sketches Drawing API ------ */
00664 
00665 // ............................
00666 // XXX 
00667 //  We need to review the calls below, since they may be/are not that suitable for
00668 //  the new ways that we intend to be drawing data...
00669 // ............................
00670 
00671 /* draw grease-pencil sketches to specified 2d-view that uses ibuf corrections */
00672 void draw_gpencil_2dimage (bContext *C, ImBuf *ibuf)
00673 {
00674     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00675     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00676     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00677     bGPdata *gpd;
00678     int offsx, offsy, sizex, sizey;
00679     int dflag = GP_DRAWDATA_NOSTATUS;
00680     
00681     /* check that we have grease-pencil stuff to draw */
00682     if (ELEM(NULL, sa, ibuf)) return;
00683     gpd= gpencil_data_get_active(C); // XXX
00684     if (gpd == NULL) return;
00685     
00686     /* calculate rect */
00687     switch (sa->spacetype) {
00688         case SPACE_IMAGE: /* image */
00689         case SPACE_CLIP: /* clip */
00690         {
00691             
00692             /* just draw using standard scaling (settings here are currently ignored anyways) */
00693             // FIXME: the opengl poly-strokes don't draw at right thickness when done this way, so disabled
00694             offsx= 0;
00695             offsy= 0;
00696             sizex= ar->winx;
00697             sizey= ar->winy;
00698             
00699             wmOrtho2(ar->v2d.cur.xmin, ar->v2d.cur.xmax, ar->v2d.cur.ymin, ar->v2d.cur.ymax);
00700             
00701             dflag |= GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYV2D|GP_DRAWDATA_IEDITHACK;
00702         }
00703             break;
00704 #if 0   /* removed since 2.5x, needs to be added back */
00705         case SPACE_SEQ: /* sequence */
00706         {
00707             SpaceSeq *sseq= (SpaceSeq *)sa->spacedata.first;
00708             float zoom, zoomx, zoomy;
00709             
00710             /* calculate accessory values */
00711             zoom= (float)(SEQ_ZOOM_FAC(sseq->zoom));
00712             if (sseq->mainb == SEQ_DRAW_IMG_IMBUF) {
00713                 /* XXX sequencer zoom should store it? */
00714                 zoomx = zoom; //  * (G.scene->r.xasp / G.scene->r.yasp);
00715                 zoomy = zoom;
00716             } 
00717             else
00718                 zoomx = zoomy = zoom;
00719             
00720             /* calculate transforms (Note: we use ibuf here, as we have it) */
00721             sizex= (int)(zoomx * ibuf->x);
00722             sizey= (int)(zoomy * ibuf->y);
00723             offsx= (int)( (ar->winx-sizex)/2 + sseq->xof );
00724             offsy= (int)( (ar->winy-sizey)/2 + sseq->yof );
00725             
00726             dflag |= GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYI2D;
00727         }
00728             break;
00729 #endif
00730         default: /* for spacetype not yet handled */
00731             offsx= 0;
00732             offsy= 0;
00733             sizex= ar->winx;
00734             sizey= ar->winy;
00735             
00736             dflag |= GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYI2D;
00737             break;
00738     }
00739     
00740     
00741     /* draw it! */
00742     gp_draw_data(gpd, offsx, offsy, sizex, sizey, CFRA, dflag);
00743 }
00744 
00745 /* draw grease-pencil sketches to specified 2d-view assuming that matrices are already set correctly 
00746  * Note: this gets called twice - first time with onlyv2d=1 to draw 'canvas' strokes, second time with onlyv2d=0 for screen-aligned strokes
00747  */
00748 void draw_gpencil_view2d (bContext *C, short onlyv2d)
00749 {
00750     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00751     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00752     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00753     bGPdata *gpd;
00754     int dflag = 0;
00755     
00756     /* check that we have grease-pencil stuff to draw */
00757     if (sa == NULL) return;
00758     gpd= gpencil_data_get_active(C); // XXX
00759     if (gpd == NULL) return;
00760     
00761     /* special hack for Image Editor */
00762     // FIXME: the opengl poly-strokes don't draw at right thickness when done this way, so disabled
00763     if (ELEM(sa->spacetype, SPACE_IMAGE, SPACE_CLIP))
00764         dflag |= GP_DRAWDATA_IEDITHACK;
00765     
00766     /* draw it! */
00767     if (onlyv2d) dflag |= (GP_DRAWDATA_ONLYV2D|GP_DRAWDATA_NOSTATUS);
00768     gp_draw_data(gpd, 0, 0, ar->winx, ar->winy, CFRA, dflag);
00769 }
00770 
00771 /* draw grease-pencil sketches to specified 3d-view assuming that matrices are already set correctly 
00772  * Note: this gets called twice - first time with only3d=1 to draw 3d-strokes, second time with only3d=0 for screen-aligned strokes
00773  */
00774 
00775 void draw_gpencil_view3d (Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, ARegion *ar, short only3d)
00776 {
00777     bGPdata *gpd;
00778     int dflag = 0;
00779     rcti rect;
00780     RegionView3D *rv3d= ar->regiondata;
00781 
00782     /* check that we have grease-pencil stuff to draw */
00783     gpd= gpencil_data_get_active_v3d(scene); // XXX
00784     if (gpd == NULL) return;
00785 
00786     /* when rendering to the offscreen buffer we don't want to
00787      * deal with the camera border, otherwise map the coords to the camera border. */
00788     if ((rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) && !(G.f & G_RENDER_OGL)) {
00789         rctf rectf;
00790         ED_view3d_calc_camera_border(scene, ar, v3d, rv3d, &rectf, TRUE); /* no shift */
00791         BLI_copy_rcti_rctf(&rect, &rectf);
00792     }
00793     else {
00794         rect.xmin = 0;
00795         rect.ymin = 0;
00796         rect.xmax = ar->winx;
00797         rect.ymax = ar->winy;
00798     }
00799     
00800     /* draw it! */
00801     if (only3d) dflag |= (GP_DRAWDATA_ONLY3D|GP_DRAWDATA_NOSTATUS);
00802 
00803     gp_draw_data(gpd, rect.xmin, rect.ymin, rect.xmax, rect.ymax, CFRA, dflag);
00804 }
